dialogue.text: What are you looking for here? Get out of here! Now!
dialogue.response: I know that you are responsible for all the evil on the island!

dialogue.text: I don't feel like chatting, go away!
HAHAHA! You're smarter than I thought. Bravo.
dialogue.response: Now I challenge you to a duel! Fight on!

dialogue.text: I have no intention of doing so. You can't stop the evil that has taken over the island. I'm leaving, goodbye!
